name: Untitled Drifting Project
description:
EARLY DEMO of iOS top down drifting game

CONTROLS:
-Use left and right arrows to steer
-You have no control over accelerating and braking
-Use Z and X keys to navigate between levels
-Minimal UI, the game is just a toy at this state
-Please give feedback in the comments below, let me know what you like/dislike, where you'd like to see this game go

Check out my free and ad-free apps on iOS!
